/* 공지사항 리스트 갯수 조회(전체) */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KB_NTC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND NTC_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR NTC_CN LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
AND NTC_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'

/* 공지사항 상세 조회 */ SELECT NOTICE.NTC_SN AS NTC_SN , NOTICE.NTC_TTL AS NTC_TTL , NOTICE.NTC_CN AS NTC_CN , NOTICE.ATCH_FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , NOTICE.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , NOTICE.NTC_YN AS NTC_YN , NOTICE.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS NTC_FILE_NAME , REPLACE(FILES.FILE_PATH, '\', '/') AS NTC_PATH FROM KB_NTC_INFO NOTICE , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE NOTICE.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND NTC_SN = #{ntc_sn}
